DOC.brief_summary: Intramuscular versus intravenous prophylactic oxytocin third stage labour follow vaginal delivery : A randomised control trial
DOC.brief_title: Intramuscular Versus Intravenous Prophylactic Oxytocin Hemorrhage After Vaginal Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: Prevention postpartum haemorrhage essential pursuit improve health care woman . In study investigator aim compare intramuscular oxytocin intravenous oxytocin routine prevention postpartum haemorrhage woman deliver vaginally.In country , intravenous access provide easily . Intramuscular application faster , easy tougher enforcement require less skill equipment . For reason , less educate , applied offering health service .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Research volunteer , undersigned , pregnant woman 2 . Only vaginal delivery ( episiotomy perineal tear ) 3 . > 34 week 4 . Cephalic presentation 5 . At low risk postpartum hemorrhage 1 . < 18 year 2 . Multiple pregnancy 3 . The presence uterine myoma 4 . Having postpartum hemorrhage previous pregnancy 5 . Placenta previa , polyhydramnios 6 . More four parity 7 . Fetal macrosomia 8 . Hb < 9mg/dl 9. preeclampsia 10 . Uterine anomaly 11 . Receiving anticoagulant therapy , suspect coagulopathy 12 . > 42 week pregnancy 13 . Oxytocin allergy
